name: Coloring Game: Pixel
description:
New Game in the Coloring Game Collection. If you’re among those who don’t like coloring large images, then this is the game for you. 30 smaller images are sure to attract your attention for 5-6 hours.

  • 30 smaller images (max. size 10,000px);
  • >150,000px;
  • New animations;
  • New challenges
